title: Set PIN
enter_sub_1:
The keypad is shuffled each time.
(Birth date or 3+ sequential digits are not allowed.)
enter_sub_2:
Please enter the same PIN again.
(Birth date or 3+ sequential digits are not allowed.)
policy_birth_yyMMdd: Your birth date (YYMMDD) cannot be part of the PIN.
policy_birth_mmdd: Your birth date (MMDD) cannot be part of the PIN.
policy_repeated: Three or more identical digits in a row are not allowed.
policy_sequence: Three ascending or descending sequential digits are not allowed.
mismatch_body: The two PIN entries do not match. Please try again.
done_body: Welcome! Your PIN has been saved securely.
